appName.description: The title of the application, displayed in the web store.

appDesc.message: Maximize your productivity with this simple-yet-complete Pomodoro timer. Track your effort and get reminded to take breaks.
appDesc.description: The description of the application, displayed in the web store.

control_start.description: Tooltip text for when the user hovers over the Start button.

control_pause.description: Tooltip text for when the user hovers over the Pause button.

control_resetCycle.description: Tooltip text for when the user hovers over the ResetCycle button.

control_resetAll.description: Tooltip text for when the user hovers over the ResetAll button.

control_skipBreak.description: Text shown when a break is active. It triggers a skip when pressed.

progress_dot.description: Tooltip text for when the user hovers over the progress dots.

complete.description: Congratulatory message that appears once all cycles have been completed.

complete_button.description: Text shown on the button that creates a new timer once all cycles have been completed.

nav_settings.description: Tooltip text for when the user hovers over the settings icon.

nav_back.description: Tooltip text for when the user hovers over the back icon.

settings_appearance.description: Title of the appearance settings section.

settings_appearance_light.description: Tooltip text for when the user hovers over the light theme icon.

settings_appearance_dark.description: Tooltip text for when the user hovers over the dark theme icon.

settings_notifications.description: Title of the notification settings section.

settings_notifications_sound.description: Setting name for enabling notification sounds.

settings_autoStart.description: Title of the automatic start settings section.

settings_autoStart_cycles.description: Setting name for automatically starting cycles.

settings_autoStart_breaks.description: Setting name for automatically starting breaks.

settings_timer.description: Title of the timer settings section.

settings_timer_cycleMinutes.description: Setting name for changing cycle minutes.

settings_timer_breakMinutes.description: Setting name for changing break minutes.

settings_timer_totalCycles.description: Setting name for changing total cycles.

settings_timer_badgeTimer.description: Setting name for enabling timer on icon.

notifications_cycle_title.description: Notification title for when a cycle is complete.

notifications_cycle_message.description: Notification text for when a cycle is complete.

notifications_break_title.description: Notification title for when a break is complete.

notifications_break_message.description: Notification text for when a break is complete.

notifications_complete_title.message: You did it! All cycles are complete.
notifications_complete_title.description: Notification title for when all cycles are complete.

notifications_complete_message.description: Notification text for when all cycles are complete.
